short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to Viola's Stamp, a guide to where Viola might've gone to support Black businesses in Toronto.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to Viola's Stamp, a guide to where Viola might've gone to support Black businesses in Toronto. The idea for this was inspired by a conversation in the Black Toronto Facebook group. Locations can be added to the community map by simply entering an address in the search bar.
